Except that according to everyone I've talked to, even though his kit screams jungle, his clear times are complete shite.
bc his damage is so low. When I look at Bard, I feel as though Riot was unsure of what they wanted him to be.

They wanted him to be a roaming support.
Which is very much a thing..........................in competitive play.......where communication is key.
Now,in the world of Solo queue,yeah Bard won't shine at all.

I've only done this once but I'd like to try it more and see others do it. I queued with two friends I always play with. Bard and poke ADC Varus went mid for a quick tower takedown, while I went lux bot lane. Any seige mage would do, like Ziggs comes to mind, with poke and wave clear. With friends, this worked well because in between jungle ganks, I would get Bard ganks. So I wasn't alone that much. With Lux, I could poke Caitlyn safely under my turret, kill minions, and got 3/0 in laning phase before taking their turret. Mid went down fast due to the almost constant 2 v 1, with 3 v 1 ganks, and Bard wandered bot and top, giving lanes twice the ganks. 

Went well one game, needs replication to see what comps are it's strengths and weaknesses. It will, of course, go badly some games but you have to repeat it to find out what it works against, and use it on those comps. The enemy won't expect it, and the beauty is you can always switch lanes if it gets too much pressure bot lane for one person.
Try this in ranked 5s, enemies are more willing to adapt to unconventional strategies there. You will see the pros and cons of the strategy.
but his kit just screams jungler! and whats the point of roaming, if you cant have any impact on the other lanes? His situational stun isn't enough to justify his roaming potential.

Either you are drunk or you have no clue what a jungle kit requires.

Top Priorities in order:

1. Ability to clear the jungle in some reasonable speed.
2. Ability to clear relatively healthy. 
3. Ability to gank a lane.
4. Ability to survive an invade.
5. Ability to invade/counterjungle.

If you don't have number 1, then you cannot have number 4 or 5 at all, and number 3 becomes near impossible because you fall so far behind from not clearing fast. Number 2 (which is all Bard has reliably as a full jungler) is just not enough to qualify him as any reasonable choice. As a roaming support, however, which is his intended role, he can coordinate ganks with the *actual* jungler and pull off some really cool stuff, and doesn't need to worry about being able to clear buffs at all, just getting vision down and looking for opportunities to set up fights or save allies.

yes i know his damage is pitiful, but he has mobililty that allows him to get to places fast, he can put down health packs before starting a camp for sustain, and his E and R allow him to set up ganks really well. Hit kit just doesn't fit that of a support imo. I have posted this same theory on other posts and have gotten plenty of agreement that his kit would be better for a jungler.

his kit is almost purely utility that is based on flat base scaling instead of AD, AP, or HP. sure he can get around to gank, but a solo bard gank is pitiful to watch because in order to gank you need to have significant damage or copious CC. Bard has one bit of damage and a little bit of short range, hard to hit CC, not solo gank material. He is better suited to being the jungler's support than the ADC's support, so maybe pulling off a hard core carry duo jungle with Bard could become a thing (like take a hyper scaling/snowballing assassin with pitiful early game survivabilty) because Bard loves to roam and he could just tag along through their clear giving a little extra damage and supplying for their lack of sustain.
By the time he gets through his first clear, the laning phase has already finished.

Saddeath who said that on your team?  Because if it was the ADC, boy do I have a few things to humble them with. ;)  I main support so I get these often.  

ADC- "Support why aren't you warding more?!" 
Me - "All my wards are out. If you want more wards your going to need to actually spend money, or use the trinket you have more." 
ADC - "Support, why don't you heal me more?" 
Me - "because I don't have heals other then my summoner spell. I have a shield... If you'd like more heals buy a health pot." 
ADC - "Support why do you keep KSing me?"
Me - "I've gotten 2 kills this entire game, with 20 assists. I am not KSing you. "
ADC - "Support why did I die? you were suppose to save me!"
Me - "I am a support, not a miracle worker. 
ADC - "You KS'd me again!!!!"
Me - "you left...not only did you leave, but you didn't even ignite him, Of course I'm going to take the kill if I can!"

ADC - "You should learn your position and place!" 
Me - "Your right, I'm going to heal and help the rest of the team, and once you understand my importance, then I will help you again." 

As a support, your best metric on how well your doing, is who the enemy team prioritizes during a team fight. If your taking 5 ults as a support, you know your doing something right. The enemy team knows your the biggest threat to them winning! ;)

There is a video for another MOBA titled. "Witch Doctor loses his patients" which best describes the emotions of playing a support. Lately the line: "Mr. Void, I prescribe to you a pair of balls" Is becoming pathetically accurate.

JUNGLER #1!!!!
reason: Junglers stratagie mixed with team effort makes or brakes a game with gank's and dragon/baron objectives!

ADC/MARKSMAN #2
reason: HIGHEST DAMAGE OUTPUT!

SUPPORT #3
Reason: earlygame protects ADC allowing them to get to the level they need to carry. Late game helps everyone in teamfights saving the members who are low on HP or CCing the enimie team.

MIDLANE #4
reason: Midlane is the frontlines and ware most the fighting is, keeeping your towers alive in mid gives you more ground advantage in teamfights and more map safty when pushing.

TOPLANE #5
Reason: without a strong 1V1 champ it is very difficult to split objectives and adds sustain in teamfights.



That said, NO ONE DESERVES TO GET LEFT BEHIND!!!! unless you know it will just get you both kill and feed, ALLWAYS help your teammates!!!!!
